means: 使心烦意乱(shatter的过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: The car shattered into a thousand burning pieces in a 200mph crash.
sentence.Network_cn: 汽车在时速为200英里时发生撞车，炸成了数以千计燃烧的碎片。

sentence.Network_en: He was shattered and bewildered by this trenchant criticism.
sentence.Network_cn: 他因这番尖锐的批评而万念俱灰，茫然不知所措。

sentence.Network_en: The force of the explosion shattered the windows of several buildings.
sentence.Network_cn: 爆炸的冲力震碎了几栋楼房的玻璃窗。

encyclopedia.content: 简介 《shattered》出自Backstreet Boys（后街男孩）专辑 《This is us》（这就是我们）。专辑概况 专辑英文名： This Is Us 歌手： Backstreet Boys 音乐风格： 流行 发行时间： 2009年09月30日 地区： 美国 语言： 英语 专辑曲目： 01.Straight Through My Heart 02.Bigger 03.Bye Bye Love 04.All Of Your Life (You Need Love) 05.If I Knew Then 06.This Is Us 07.PDA 08.Masquerade 09.She's A Dream 10.Shattered 11.Undon

entry.tran: 无比惊愕难过的;遭受极大打击的
entry.def: If you are shattered by something, you are extremely shocked and upset about it.

example.ex: It is desperately sad news and I am absolutely shattered to hear it.
example.tran: 这是个令人悲痛欲绝的消息，我听后彻底崩溃了。

entry.def: If you say you are shattered, you mean you are extremely tired and have no energy left.

example.ex: He was shattered and too tired to concentrate on schoolwork.
example.tran: 他筋疲力尽，累得都无法集中注意力做作业。

sentences.sentence: "the police came in through the splintered door"
"our shattered dreams of peace and prosperity"
"a tattered remnant of its former strength"
